description: Light, comfortable and packable jacket for hiking and travelling in warm climates – Abisko Hike Jacket M has properties perfect for travelling and hiking in warm climates: Breathability, comfort, and quick-drying, made in G-1000 Air Stretch with recycled polyester and organic cotton. This hiking jacket is packable in its own pocket, lightweight, and easy to store when not used. The adjustable hood can be rolled up and stowed in the collar. Two zippered hand pockets, two top- loaded pockets, one zippered and one with a welt pocket opening, drawcord adjustment at the hem, and elastic edging at cuffs.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Hike Jacket - Mens
